word:
A Title to the Heavenly Possessions 

     The day is coming when "a man shall cast his idols of silver, and his idols of gold, which they made each 
                                                                           225
one for himself to worship, to the moles and to the bats; to go into the clefts of the rocks, and into the tops of the ragged rocks, for fear of the Lord, and for the glory of His majesty." The riches of the world will not avail in the day of wrath; but faith and obedience will bring the victory.
